scripts.security:scan: node -e "const { VulnerabilityScanner } = require('./lib/vulnerability-scanner'); const scanner = new VulnerabilityScanner(); scanner.runFullScan().then(console.log).catch(console.error);"
scripts.security:report: node -e "const { SecurityReporter } = require('./lib/security-reporter'); const { VulnerabilityScanner } = require('./lib/vulnerability-scanner'); const { SecurityMonitor } = require('./lib/security-monitor'); const vs = new VulnerabilityScanner(); const sm = new SecurityMonitor(); const sr = new SecurityReporter(vs, sm); sr.generateSecurityReport().then(console.log).catch(console.error);"
scripts.security:dashboard: node -e "const { SecurityReporter } = require('./lib/security-reporter'); const { VulnerabilityScanner } = require('./lib/vulnerability-scanner'); const { SecurityMonitor } = require('./lib/security-monitor'); const vs = new VulnerabilityScanner(); const sm = new SecurityMonitor(); const sr = new SecurityReporter(vs, sm); sr.generateSecurityReport({formats: ['html']}).then(r => console.log('Dashboard generated:', r.id)).catch(console.error);"
scripts.security:check: npm run security:audit && npm run security:scan
scripts.security:monitor: node -e "console.log('Security monitoring is integrated into the main server. Start with: npm start')"
scripts.security:test: node -e "const scanner = require('./lib/vulnerability-scanner'); console.log('Security system test completed');"
